avalancheActivity.highlights: Not much snow in the region and older snow in upper parts is considered stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Not much snow in the region and older snow in upper parts is stable after mild weather and rain recently.

travelAdvisory.comment: Little snow is left in the lowlands in most parts and ongoing melt is expected in the next couple of days with rain, warm weather and strong winds. Some wind slabs may form in the uppermost part of mountains.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Little snow in most parts and ongoing warm weather will increase snow melt in the next few days.

weatherForecast.highlights: Milt veður og hægviðri yfir helgina.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Generally rather little snow but wind slabs high in the mountains which can be unstable. Increased likelihood of wet avalanches.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It is generally rather snow-free, but snow has managed to accumulate on the sheltered sides of the mountains after prolonged northeasterly winds and snow showers. The snow has melted and settled lower down in the mountains. At the highest elevations there has been some additional accumulation, but snow has also subsided. No snow pits have been dug to assess stability, but it should be assumed that recent wind slabs may be unstable. Wet snow conditions also expected next days in warm weather

travelAdvisory.comment: Little snow is left in the lowlands in most parts and ongoing melt is expected in the next couple of days with rain, warm weather and strong winds. Some wind slabs may form in the uppermost part of mountains.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Little snow in most parts and ongoing warm weather will increase snow melt in the next few days.

weatherForecast.highlights: Austlæg eða norðaustlæg átt, úrkomulítið og fremur milt. Mögulega smá éljagangur á sunnudag og mánudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow may have formed slabs inland and higher up in the mountains. The older snow has strengthened in the mild weather over the past days.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow may have formed slabs inland and higher up in the mountains. The older snow has strengthened in the mild weather over the past days and has melted significantly at lower elevations, especially along the coast.

travelAdvisory.comment: Little snow is left in the lowlands in most parts and ongoing melt is expected in the next couple of days with rain, warm weather and strong winds. Some wind slabs may form in the uppermost part of mountains.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Little snow in most parts and ongoing warm weather will increase snow melt in the next few days.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hægur vindur og lítilsháttar snjókoma til fjalla yfir helgina.

avalancheActivity.comment: Three avalanches released in Norðfjörður on Dec 5th. No new reports of avalanches last few days.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow er high in the mountains but warm temperatures and rain has affected the snow. Snow has melted or subsided at lower elevations. No reports of recent avalanches that could indicate stability.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow er high in the mountains but warm temperatures and rain has affected the snow. Snow has melted or subsided at lower elevations. No reports of recent avalanches that could indicate stability.

travelAdvisory.comment: Little snow is left in the lowlands in most parts and ongoing melt is expected in the next couple of days with rain, warm weather and strong winds. Some wind slabs may form in the uppermost part of mountains.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Little snow in most parts and ongoing warm weather will increase snow melt in the next few days.

weatherForecast.highlights: Minnkandi SA átt og dregur úr úrkomu föstudagskvöld. Suðlæg eða breytileg átt um helgina og lítilsháttar skúrir. Milt í veðri
